step2.title: Development & Test

Services.title: Strategic solutions
Services.subtitle: Complete digital transformation—from e-commerce to AI automation.

service1.title: Shopify E-Commerce
service1.description: Professional Shopify stores with premium design, payment setup, and SEO optimization. Vienna funding eligible—up to 50% subsidized.

service2.title: Custom Web Applications
service2.description: Tailored business solutions—SaaS platforms, booking systems, customer portals, and internal tools built with modern technology.

service3.title: AI Business Automation
service3.description: Custom AI assistants trained on your data for customer support, document analysis, and intelligent process automation.

service4.title: Performance Marketing
service4.description: Data-driven Google Ads and Meta campaigns with continuous optimization, A/B testing, and ROI tracking to maximize conversions.

service5.title: Technical SEO
service5.description: Comprehensive SEO audits, local search optimization, and ongoing monitoring to increase organic visibility and drive traffic.

service6.title: E-Commerce Optimization
service6.description: Ongoing Shopify optimization, conversion rate improvement, analytics tracking, and performance monitoring for sustained growth.

Benefits.subtitle: Discover the key benefits of partnering with us.

benefit1.title: Cost Reduction
benefit1.description: Optimize business processes and streamline operations to significantly minimize costs and maximize overall efficiency.

benefit2.title: Improved Outcomes
benefit2.description: Leverage powerful data-driven insights and innovative strategies to enhance business performance and achieve superior outcomes.

benefit3.title: Increased Productivity
benefit3.description: Enhance group performance and output by automating redundant tasks, refining processes, and speeding up business functions.

Testimonials.title: Trusted by
Testimonials.subtitle: Discover how we've driven growth and innovation.

testimonial1.content: They transformed our retail business with a professional Shopify store that increased our online sales by 250% in the first quarter.

testimonial2.content: The custom booking system they built streamlined our entire operation. We now handle 3x more appointments with the same staff.

testimonial3.content: Their AI chatbot handles 80% of customer inquiries automatically, freeing our team to focus on complex cases and improving satisfaction.

testimonial4.content: The Vienna funding guidance was invaluable—we got 50% of our €15,000 project subsidized. Exceptional service and ROI.

FAQ.title: Ask whatever you have
FAQ.subtitle: FAQs designed to provide the information you need.
FAQ.stillHaveQuestionsText: Our team is here to help. Get in touch and we'll answer all your questions.

q1.question: What services do you offer?
q1.answer: We specialize in Shopify e-commerce development, custom web applications, AI-powered business solutions, performance marketing, technical SEO, and ongoing optimization services for businesses in Vienna and the DACH region.

q2.question: How long does a typical project take?
q2.answer: A Shopify e-commerce setup typically takes 4-6 weeks, custom web applications range from 8-16 weeks, and AI solutions take 6-12 weeks depending on complexity. We provide detailed timelines during our discovery phase.

q3.question: Do you offer ongoing support after launch?
q3.answer: Absolutely! We provide comprehensive monthly packages for SEO, performance marketing, e-commerce optimization, and AI model management to ensure your solution continues delivering results.

q4.question: What is the Vienna funding advantage?
q4.answer: Vienna-based businesses can access up to 50% funding from Wirtschaftsagentur Wien for digital transformation projects over €10,000. We help you navigate the application process to maximize your funding—effectively cutting your costs in half.

q5.question: Can you integrate with existing systems?
q5.answer: Yes! We specialize in integrating with CRMs, payment gateways, inventory systems, marketing tools, and third-party APIs to create seamless workflows across your business operations.

q6.question: What makes your AI solutions different?
q6.answer: Our AI solutions are custom-trained on your specific business data, providing genuine competitive advantages. We offer both AWS cloud-based and on-premise deployments based on your security and regulatory requirements.
